content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":165451,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひぃふぅ、鬼……怖いです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hii-fuu, demons... they're scary...\""},{"lineNumber":165452,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うがぁぁああああぁ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugaaaahhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":165453,"originalJapaneseLine":"　兄弟の仇ーーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Revenge for my brothersーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":165454,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げっ、また突っ込んでくるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, they're charging again!\""},{"lineNumber":165455,"originalJapaneseLine":"「退いて下さい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please fall back!\""},{"lineNumber":165456,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここは私が――！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll handle this place――!\""},{"lineNumber":165457,"originalJapaneseLine":"メルフェイスが前に出て、","translatedEnglishLine":"Melphis stepped forward,"},{"lineNumber":165458,"originalJapaneseLine":"両手に集めた魔力を光り輝かせ、","translatedEnglishLine":"gathering magical power in both hands, making it shine brightly,"},{"lineNumber":165459,"originalJapaneseLine":"鬼達の足下に放った。","translatedEnglishLine":"and unleashed it at the feet of the demons."},{"lineNumber":165460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おおっと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa!?\""},{"lineNumber":165461,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あがっ！？　うがっ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Agh!? Ugh!?\""},{"lineNumber":165462,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、足、足――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My legs, my legs――\""},{"lineNumber":165463,"originalJapaneseLine":"「動かねぇえええぇえ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I can't moveeeeee!?\""},{"lineNumber":165464,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか、いつかの戦場で見た","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see, it's the same heavy adhesive ground I saw once on the battlefield.\""},{"lineNumber":165465,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大粘着地面か！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The great sticky ground!\""},{"lineNumber":165466,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大したもんだ、一人で三十体の","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Amazing, alone you stopped thirty demons' movements.\""},{"lineNumber":165467,"originalJapaneseLine":"　鬼の動きを止めたぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You stopped the demons from moving.\""},{"lineNumber":165468,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただ……うっ、もって二分、です……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... ugh, it'll last only two minutes...\""},{"lineNumber":165469,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その間にどうにか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We have to manage somehow in that time...\""},{"lineNumber":165470,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オーケだ、任せろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okay, leave it to me.\""},{"lineNumber":165471,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シィーーーーール！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seaaal!\""},{"lineNumber":165472,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-Yes!\""},{"lineNumber":165473,"originalJapaneseLine":"　チューリップ部隊に連絡ですね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll contact the Tulip unit!\""},{"lineNumber":165474,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスさんから連絡が来たわ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A message from Rance-san has arrived!\""},{"lineNumber":165475,"originalJapaneseLine":"　座標調節急いで！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hurry up and adjust the coordinates!\""},{"lineNumber":165476,"originalJapaneseLine":"「発射よーーーーーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Prepare to fireーーーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":165477,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってーーーーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fireーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":165478,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス総統から連絡が来たわ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A message from Supreme Commander Rance has come!\""},{"lineNumber":165479,"originalJapaneseLine":"　座標調節急いで！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Adjust the coordinates quickly!\""},{"lineNumber":165480,"originalJapaneseLine":"「発射よーーーーーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Prepare to fireーーーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":165481,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ってーーーーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fireーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":165482,"originalJapaneseLine":"チューリップ2号、マレスケが火を噴いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tulip Unit No. 2, Malesque, unleashed fire."},{"lineNumber":165483,"originalJapaneseLine":"「き、来ます！　皆さん、伏せて下さい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's coming! Everyone, take cover!\""},{"lineNumber":165484,"originalJapaneseLine":"言うが早いか、","translatedEnglishLine":"No sooner said,"},{"lineNumber":165485,"originalJapaneseLine":"マレスケの着弾により、","translatedEnglishLine":"than Malesque's shell hit,"},{"lineNumber":165486,"originalJapaneseLine":"目の前で巨大な爆発が起こった。","translatedEnglishLine":"causing a huge explosion right before their eyes."},{"lineNumber":165487,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお！　全員ブッ殺したぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh! We killed them all!\""},{"lineNumber":165488,"originalJapaneseLine":"　がはははは！　一網打尽とはこのことだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha! This is what it means to catch them all in one net!\""},{"lineNumber":165489,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう……なんとかなりましたね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew... we managed somehow...\""},{"lineNumber":165490,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、よく頑張ったの、メルフェイス」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed, you did well, Melphis.\""},{"lineNumber":165491,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おと……ど〜ん……こわ〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thud... boom... scary...\""},{"lineNumber":165492,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":165493,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この方法が一番効率が良さそうだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This method seems to be the most efficient!\""},{"lineNumber":165494,"originalJapaneseLine":"　別の部隊にもかますぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's use it on the other units as well!\""},{"lineNumber":165495,"originalJapaneseLine":"「鬼部隊を発見！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Demon unit spotted!\""},{"lineNumber":165496,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よーし、またしばくぞー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, let's beat them again!\""},{"lineNumber":165497,"originalJapaneseLine":"　メルフェイス！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Melphis!\""},{"lineNumber":165498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、大粘着地面！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, the great sticky ground!\""},{"lineNumber":165499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほげっ！？　動けねェェェエ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hoge!? I can't moveee!?\""},{"lineNumber":165500,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして――","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And then――\""},{"lineNumber":165501,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ドカーーーーーーン！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"BOOOOOOOM!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":165502,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐぎゃあああああ！？！？！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gugyaaaaah!?!?!?\""},{"lineNumber":165503,"originalJapaneseLine":"チューリップの砲撃が鬼の部隊を吹き飛ばした。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Tulip's shelling blew the demon unit away."},{"lineNumber":165504,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは！　痛快痛快！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha! Thrilling, thrilling!\""},{"lineNumber":165505,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、生き残りを俺様がしばーーーく！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And I'll take care of the survivors!\""},{"lineNumber":165506,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しんど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tired...\""},{"lineNumber":165507,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひぃふぅ、鬼……怖いです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hii-fuu, demons... they're scary...\""},{"lineNumber":165508,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うがぁぁああああぁ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugaaaahhhh!\""},{"lineNumber":165509,"originalJapaneseLine":"　兄弟の仇ーーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Revenge for my brothersーーー!\""},{"lineNumber":165510,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げっ、また突っ込んでくるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, they're charging again!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兄弟の仇ーーーーーー！」
「げっ、また突っ込んでくるぞ！」
メルフェイスが前に出て、
両手に集めた魔力を光り輝かせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: gathering magical power in both hands, making it shine brightly,
and unleashed it at the feet of the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうか、いつかの戦場で見た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see, it's the same heavy adhesive ground I saw once on the battlefield."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大したもんだ、一人で三十体の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Amazing, alone you stopped thirty demons' movements."
"But... ugh, it'll last only two minutes..."
"We have to manage somehow in that time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チューリップ部隊に連絡ですね！」
「ランスさんから連絡が来たわ！
「ランス総統から連絡が来たわ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A message from Supreme Commander Rance has come!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チューリップ2号、マレスケが火を噴いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tulip Unit No. 2, Malesque, unleashed fire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「き、来ます！　皆さん、伏せて下さい！」
マレスケの着弾により、
目の前で巨大な爆発が起こった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: causing a huge explosion right before their eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお！　全員ブッ殺したぞ！
がはははは！　一網打尽とはこのことだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha! This is what it means to catch them all in one net!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふう……なんとかなりましたね……」
「うむ、よく頑張ったの、メルフェイス」
この方法が一番効率が良さそうだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This method seems to be the most efficient!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別の部隊にもかますぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's use it on the other units as well!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、またしばくぞー！
「ほげっ！？　動けねェェェエ！？」
チューリップの砲撃が鬼の部隊を吹き飛ばした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Tulip's shelling blew the demon unit away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、生き残りを俺様がしばーーーく！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And I'll take care of the survivors!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兄弟の仇ーーーーーー！」
「げっ、また突っ込んでくるぞ！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
